free_text.Learning outcomes: this course will present all aspects of supplementary cementitious materials and their use in concrete.
free_text.Content: 1.[][]Overview of course and summary objectives, perspective on sustainable development.[br/]2.[][]Sources of SCM- production, composition and characterisation[br/]3.[][]Effect of SCM of early age propersties of concrte: rheology, temperature rise, ec.[br/]4.[][]Effect of SCMs in cimentitious systems[br/]5.[][]Effect of SCMs on 'in service' performance: strength, transport properties, etc.[br/]6.[][]Role of SCMs in Durability[br/]7.[][]Alternative Cementitious Binders: Chemical Persperctives[br/]8.[][]Activiated clay for developing countries[br/]9.[][]Summary and conclusions[br/]

free_text.Contenu: 1. Overview of course and summary objectives, perspective on sustainable development.[br/]2. Sources of SCM- production, composition and characterisation[br/]3. Effect of SCM of early age propersties of concrte: rheology, temperature rise, ec.[br/]4. Effect of SCMs in cimentitious systems[br/]5. free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: this course will present all aspects of supplementary cementitious materials and their use in concrete.
